meanings.definition: To go to see or spend time with (someone) socially
meanings.sent1: I enjoy visiting my grandparents on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She is visiting her friend in the hospital today.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to think it's visiting royalty when it enters the room.
meanings.sent4: The idea of visiting new places is like opening a door to adventure.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the zoo made the children's eyes light up with excitement.

meanings.definition: The act of going to see or spend time with (someone) socially
meanings.sent1: Visiting can bring joy and connection to relationships.
meanings.sent2: We had a lovely visit thanks to your visiting last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The visiting of the neighbors' dog always brings a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: In a busy world, the art of visiting can be a calming ritual.
meanings.sent5: The visiting of friends can create lasting memories and bonds.
